name: My Little World
description:
My Little World is a relaxing puzzle game where you build you own world and gather points by strategically placing tiles.

The game is currently in early acces, with more content to come soon! Make sure to check out the roadmap below for more information on what's next:



Build and Expand


In One Tile Mode you only have access to a single tile at a time, connecting tiles the right way grants points, points level you up and levels give you more tiles to build with. There is also a Multiple Tiles Mode, where you get tiles much faster, and you can also place any of the tiles you have. The Custom Game Mode allows you to set your own rules to the game, allowing it to be anywhere from the easiest game you've played, to an impossible challenge.

Unleash your Creativity


If puzzles are not your taste, you can play in Freebuilding Mode, where you can build anything you want using all of the in-game tiles.
